interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Gryph & IvyRose Coat of Arms Hydrating Lotion for Kids - Hydrating Moisturizer with Shea Butter & Coconut Oil - All Natural, Sustainable, Cruelty Free, No Parabens, No Sulfates, Vegan - USA Made - 8oz
Review Date: 2021/12/22
Store: Gryph & IvyRose
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Gryph & IvyRose', 'Scent': 'Coconut Shea', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Active Ingredients': 'Sweet Almond Oil', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '5.67 x 2.28 x 2.24 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '856991007210'}
Review Text: This is my third purchase from this brand! I got their shampoo/body wash and conditioner. Their products are amazing and I love the natural ingredients! Lotion is very hydrating for kids skin and has a nice scent. Quick absorbing and leaves skin feeling very soft and smooth. Definitely recommend!
Review Title: Great natural lotion for kids
Rating: 5.0

Nu-pore Hydrocolloid Pimple Patch - Blemish Patches to care for Blemish Control, scar prevention, must haves tools for skincare. korean makeup trusted cosmetics secret k-beauty. 60 Patches
nu-pore
{'Brand': 'Nu-pore', 'Item Form': 'Patch', 'Product Benefits': 'Blemish Control', 'Scent': 'Hydrocolloid', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 3 x 3 inches; 1.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '780707702413'}
I tend to breakout a lot especially week prior to menstrual period. These pimple patches do a great job in minimizing pimple size and inflammation. I put it on at night before bed and when I wake up in the morning, the pimple is almost gone. It has good adhesion, mine did not come off during sleep. I definitely recommend.
Helps minimize inflammation
Eggplant Clearing Cleansing Oil Pad 60 pads, Makeup remover pad. Exfoliating. Simple easy quick wipe. Moisturizing cleansing oil pad
PAPA RECIPE RIGHT FOR SKIN
{'Brand': 'PAPA RECIPE RIGHT FOR SKIN', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '3.98 x 3.82 x 2.72 inches; 10.86 Ounces'}
Love these cleansing pads. I typically use fragrance free body oil to remove eye makeup, but was happy to see same thing in a pad. I was worried it would irritate the eyes, but it didn't! I used one pad for both eyes to remove waterproof mascara and eyeliner. No irritation and it took everything off! Definitely recommend!
Removes stubborn makeup, even waterproof mascara!

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

**Skincare Preferences:** The user maintains a strong focus on managing acne and blemish control while also showing an increasing interest in hydrating solutions that cater to sensitive skin. Their recent purchase indicates a growing affinity for natural, gentle products that emphasize hydration and quick absorption without irritation.

**Treatment Methods:** The user continues to prefer topical solutions, particularly convenient options like cleansing pads. However, they are also exploring hydrating lotions that offer effective moisture without compromising their skincare routine. 

**Product Characteristics:** The user values good adhesion, usability, and natural ingredients in skincare products. Their positive reception to gentle cleansing methods is complemented by an appreciation for lotions that are nourishing yet non-irritating, suitable for both themselves and family needs.

**Purchase Behavior:** The user leans towards K-beauty products but has expanded their repertoire to include brands that prioritize all-natural and cruelty-free formulations. They exhibit discernment in their choices, favoring products with high ratings and detailed feedback, reflecting a commitment to quality.

**Overall Trends:** The user maintains a consistent pursuit of acne-focused solutions while diversifying their routine with multi-functional hydration products. They value efficiency, convenience, and product reliability, indicating a holistic approach to skincare that considers both their needs and those of their children.
